Package com.github.tommyettinger.ds.support.util

Interface FloatAppender

All Superinterfaces:
com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjFloatToObjBiFunction<StringBuilder,StringBuilder>
public interface FloatAppender extends com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjFloatToObjBiFunction<StringBuilder,StringBuilder>
A convenience wrapper around an ObjFloatToObjBiFunction that takes and returns a StringBuilder, as well as taking a float. This is often a method reference to a method in Base, such as Base.appendSigned(StringBuilder, float).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final FloatAppender
    DEFAULT
    A static constant to avoid Android and its R8 compiler allocating a new lambda every time StringBuilder::append is present at a call-site.
    static final FloatAppender
    DENSE
    An alternative FloatAppender constant that appends five Base.BASE90 digits for every float input.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjFloatToObjBiFunction

    apply

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT

      static final FloatAppender DEFAULT
      A static constant to avoid Android and its R8 compiler allocating a new lambda every time StringBuilder::append is present at a call-site. This should be used in place of StringBuilder.append(float) when you want to use that as a FloatAppender.

    • DENSE

      static final FloatAppender DENSE
      An alternative FloatAppender constant that appends five Base.BASE90 digits for every float input. The five ASCII chars are not expected to be human-readable.
      This is a static constant to avoid Android and its R8 compiler allocating a new lambda every time this lambda would be present at a call-site.
